text: Ian Brennan is a television writer, actor, and producer. Brennan is known mostly for creating the FOX television series, Glee. He has written "all of the episodes" along with two other colleagues. Brennan's first written television series was Growing in 2006. He has also been in several theater performances since 1999. He was nominated for two 2010 Writers Guild of America Awards for Glee. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Illinois Category:American movie actors Category:American musical theatre actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:American television writers Category:American television producers
title: Ian Brennan
